title: [LFM] Looking for Gold+ Members for a Casual Ranked Team
body:
Looking for semi-dedicated members to join!

Come have a good time, work on ward skins and enjoy a team environment, the way league is meant to be played.

Having a mic is required
We'll probably use curse voice for communication.
Gold+ 

'Summoner Name: 
'Preferred role:
'Preferred champions:
Age:

' _indicates required_

Feel free to add me Xen and have a chat!
